scripts.start: npm i && npm fund && npm audit fix --force && npm link && tsc -w
scripts.commit: npm run write && git add . && node ./.github/scripts/message.js
scripts.patch: npm run commit && npm version patch && npm run tag && npm publish && git push
scripts.minor: npm run commit && npm version minor && npm run tag && npm publish && git push
scripts.major: npm run commit && npm version major && npm run tag && npm publish && git push
scripts.site: git add docs && npm run commit && git push
scripts.write: npm i && npm run build && npm run format
